test/Tests/QueryPath/Extensions/QPXSLTest.php

00001 <?php
00002 /**
00003  * Tests for the QueryPath library.
00004  * @author M Butcher <matt@aleph-null.tv>
00005  * @license The GNU Lesser GPL (LGPL) or an MIT-like license.
00006  */
00007 
00008 require_once 'PHPUnit/Autoload.php';
00009 require_once 'src/QueryPath/QueryPath.php';
00010 require_once 'src/QueryPath/Extension/QPXSL.php';
00011 /**
00012  * @ingroup querypath_tests
00013  */
00014 class QPXSLTests extends PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase {
00015   
00016   protected $file = './test/advanced.xml';
00017   
00018   public function testXSLT() {
00019     // XML and XSLT taken from http://us.php.net/manual/en/xsl.examples-collection.php
00020     // and then modified to be *actually welformed* XML.
00021     $orig = '<?xml version="1.0"?><collection>
00022      <cd>
00023       <title>Fight for your mind</title>
00024       <artist>Ben Harper</artist>
00025       <year>1995</year>
00026      </cd>
00027      <cd>
00028       <title>Electric Ladyland</title>
00029       <artist>Jimi Hendrix</artist>
00030       <year>1997</year>
00031      </cd>
00032     </collection>';
00033     
00034     $template = '<?xml version="1.0"?><xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform">
00035      <xsl:param name="owner" select="\'Nicolas Eliaszewicz\'"/>
00036      <xsl:output method="html" encoding="iso-8859-1" indent="no"/>
00037      <xsl:template match="collection">
00038       <div>
00039       Hey! Welcome to <xsl:value-of select="$owner"/>\'s sweet CD collection! 
00040       <xsl:apply-templates/>
00041       </div>
00042      </xsl:template>
00043      <xsl:template match="cd">
00044       <h1><xsl:value-of select="title"/></h1>
00045       <h2>by <xsl:value-of select="artist"/> - <xsl:value-of select="year"/></h2>
00046       <hr />
00047      </xsl:template>
00048     </xsl:stylesheet>
00049     ';
00050     
00051     $qp = qp($orig)->xslt($template);
00052     $this->assertEquals(2, $qp->top('h1')->size(), 'Make sure that data was formatted');
00053   }
00054 }
